title: Polki Diamond and Aquamarine Kanthi Necklace with Pearl Accents
materials: Natural Pearls. Features the unique *Jadau* setting technique.
features: This exquisite Kanthi necklace features a central square pendant adorned with a stunning aquamarine cabochon, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds in a *Jadau* setting. The multi-strand pearl design is anchored by smaller Polki diamond units, mirroring the design of the central pendant, and finished with pearl drops for a touch of elegance. The gold exhibits meticulous craftsmanship using time-honored techniques.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Suitable for modern evening events to add a touch of royal charm.
description: This necklace is a testament to the rich jewelry heritage of Hyderabad, blending traditional craftsmanship with elegant design. The use of Polki diamonds and natural pearls adds a touch of timeless beauty, while the aquamarine center stone offers a contemporary twist. Own a piece of South Indian heritage with this Kanthi, showcasing the esteemed *Jadau* technique, known for its intricate stone-setting process.
